PathUID.description: The UID of the path used by this object.

StartPosition1D.description: The 1-dimentional position within the given path at which the pulley will start.

EndPosition1D.description: The 1-dimentional position within the given path at which the pulley will stop.

IsJumpCancel.description: Whether you can jump off once you've begun zipping along the pulley?

Offset.description: How much to offset the pulley from the given path.

MinSpeed.description: The amount of speed you'll zip along the given path just by grabbing the pulley.

MaxSpeed.description: The maximum amount of speed you can zip along the given path if you grab the pulley at a fast pace.

Targets.description: The objects affected by this event.

Type.description: What type of signal to send to each affected object.

Timer.description: How long to wait after this event is triggered before sending a signal to all affected objects.
